modName: Better Hand Mesh for UNP UNPB UNPC
summary:
Better Hand Mesh for UNP UNPB UNPC CHSBHC and Bethesda's body

Original uses
872 Vertices

This version uses
1452 Vertices
descriptionHtml:
Better Hand Mesh for UNP UNPB UNPC CHSBHC and Bethesda's body

Original uses
872 Vertices

This version uses
1452 Vertices

This is a repackage of Bethesda's first person hand for third person use.

Update: I slightly edited the UVM, only moved 6 vertices references to help match UNP original. Includes this update to the first person hands.
Added Package for Temptress race users.
Added Package for Lunari race users. Note: custom UNP body has seam on left wrist (also there with default hand), only includes third person hand, first person uses CBBE.
Added Package for The Ashen race users Note: only includes third person hand.

Works with

UNP and UNP Skinny both at 1.2, also 1.3test

UNPB 2.2 and 2.2p also 2.2x, not compatible with 2.4

UNPC 2.1.0

Vanilla (default Bethesda) body Note: has the same texture mismatch the original has by the wrist. I recommend that you use a greatly improved foot mesh, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3666]FemFeet by Phygit[/url]

CHSBHC 2.4.1 Note: same issues as default hands

Might work with other races, I haven't tested yet.

Thanks to stuffed_bunny for the idea.

Thanks to
Dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]

UNPB Body
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20227]TroubleMakers Clothing UNPB also BBP and BBPx - UNPB Body Main Page[/url]

Halofarm
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25080]UNPCv2 Project[/url] <- no longer on the nexus, you can search the web for his site.

CherryHotaling
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod[/url]

Psychos1s and Brokefoot's
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18717]Temptress Race[/url]

bhaktisean's
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21602]Lunari Race[/url]

Seren4XX and RadioRagae's
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8583]The Ashen Race - HD[/url]

Released for Modder's Resource as well.
